## QueueCorrelationPosition enum

How to use queue correlation id

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum QueueCorrelationPosition 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  None | <code>0</code> | Correlation id will not be used |
|  Prefix | <code>1</code> | Correlation id will be used as prefix of queue/publish name |
|  Replace | <code>3</code> | Correlation id will replace specified constant in whole (including prefix) queue/publish string |
|  Suffix | <code>2</code> | Correlation id will be used as suffix of queue/publish name |
